articles.title: South Africa shooting: Manhunt underway as 17 people killed in Eastern Cape village attack - BBC.com
articles.description: Fifteen women and two men were killed in a targeted attack on a village in Lusikisiki, police say.
articles.content:
Seventeen people have been killed in a mass shooting in a remote South African town with a manhunt under way to find the perpetrators, police say.
Two homesteads in the town of Lusikisiki in the Eas… [+2324 chars]
